text: "Army Dreamers" is a 1980 song by Kate Bush and is the third single from her third studio album Never for Ever. It went to number 16 in the United Kingdom, number 14 in Ireland, number 25 in the Netherlands and number 2 in Israel. The song was banned during the Gulf War. == Track listing == # "Army Dreamers" – 3:17 # "Delius" – 2:51 # "Passing Through Air" – 2:10 ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Kate Bush songs
title: Army Dreamers
